New Records: Anthony Edwards set a record for the most three-pointers made in the first nine games of a season with 50
Key Match Events: The Minnesota Timberwolves won the game 127-102 against the Portland Trail Blazers
Anthony Edwards scored 37 points and added six rebounds, five assists, one steal, and one block in just 30 minutes on the court
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards is now third on the all-time list for most three-pointers in that span
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Edwards averaged 29 points, 5.9 rebounds, and 3.6 assists per game this season
He is a two-time All-Star and helped lead the Timberwolves to the Western Conference finals for the first time since 2004
Others: The Timberwolves will face the Miami Heat on Sunday at the Target Center
